notes.text: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
SmartFilterBar: Fix alignment of filter items and label cut-off in different languages
BaseController: Error is no longer thrown when data is extended
ValueHelpDialog: remove description column if descriptionOnly or idOnly is used for the key
SmartFilterBar: fetchVariant not removing empty filters if setFilterData is suspended
SmartField: The field value is now removed
SmartFilterBar: conversion for Edm.Int data types with 0 as value is now correct
SmartField now reads criticality from DataPoint and FieldGroup annotations
